reviewText: excellent! Arrived sooner then expected. Not pristine picture quality- but if you like the magnificent Carol Connors- get it now!

You would think, given the price and the apparent dedication of an entire DVD to this movie (as opposed to the twin-bill alternatives), that this would be a reasonable copy.  It is extremely low-rez, probably because there are three additional movies buried on the disk and only available if you send in money to get a key to unlock them on your computer.  Apparently the key is only good for 3 days.  What you have left is a very blurry and barely watchable movie.  As for the film, it is XXX and has a couple of brief moments that hold your interest, but not for long. Everything is embedded in an embarrassing attempt to make hybrid comedy-porn which, as Bill Maher has pointed out, means that each endeavor ruins the other.  A straight-out adult film with the same director and star would be vastly preferable.
